required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study of AMG531 (Romiplostim) in Patients With Aplastic Anemia
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 2/3 Study of AMG531 Combined With Ciclosporin A in Patients With Aplastic Anemia Previously Untreated With Immunosuppressive Therapy

brief_summary.textblock: To evaluate the hematological responses based on the response assessment criteria defined in this study (the 531-004 response assessment criteria) when AMG531 is subcutaneously (SC)-administered with ciclosporin A (CsA) therapy for 6 months in patients with aplastic anemia (AA) who were previously untreated with immunosuppressive therapy.

primary_outcome.measure: Rate of achievement of complete response (CR) or partial response (PR)

secondary_outcome.measure: Rate of achievement of CR or PR
The time to CR or PR
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Each time point evaluated weekly until Week 27

secondary_outcome.measure: Reduction or independence of platelet and/or erythrocyte transfusion
Change from baseline in platelet count (/µL)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Each time point evaluated weekly until Week 27

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in hemoglobin (Hb) concentration (g/dL)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Each time point evaluated weekly until Week 27

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in neutrophil count (/µL)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Each time point evaluated weekly until Week 27

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in reticulocyte count (/µL)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Each time point evaluated weekly until Week 27

intervention.description: Subcutaneous administration of 0 to 20ug/kg for 6 months
